title: Ginga Sengoku Gunyuuden Rai (Galaxy Warring State Chronicle Rai)
synopsis: Rai is a space opera that fuses feudal Chinese and Japanese customs with vast galaxy spanning empires and space-going societies. The story follows the life and times of the samurai Rai, and the quest of several spacefaring factions for control of territory and, of course, the Empire.
voices: ['Hiyama, Nobuyuki', 'Yao, Kazuki', 'Yamada, Eiko', 'Mitsuishi, Kotono', 'Takashima, Gara', 'Kumagaya, Nina', 'Sawaki, Ikuya', 'Watabe, Takeshi', 'Ogata, Megumi', 'Okiayu, Ryoutarou']
staff: [['Okuda, Seiji', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Honda, Yasunori', ['Sound Director']], ['Watanabe, Takashi', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Sokuza, Makoto', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']]]
